# ControlWidgetToggleDefaultLabel

**Structure**

A view that represents the default label for a toggle control if you don’t provide a label.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct ControlWidgetToggleDefaultLabel
```

## Overview

You don’t initialize this type yourself. Instead, WidgetKit creates this type when you initialize a [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/ControlWidgetToggle] without a label.

## Conforms To

- View
title: ControlWidgetToggleDefaultLabel
